channel.title: Robert Bohl Games: Last Chance Sale
channel.description: Robert Bohl Games is going out of business on Saturday the 19th. Until then (that is, today and tomorrow), [all PDFs and books are on sale for half off](http://misspentyouth.robertbohl.com/shop). Robert Bohl Games also sells internationally, and retail customers’ discounts are on top of the 50% sale. And if you can’t afford the half-off price, RBG will work with you to get a price that works for you.

item.title: Robert Bohl Games: Last Chance Sale
item.dc:creator: @RobertBohl
item.description:
@RobertBohl wrote:

Thanks, Lowell!

I’m happy to answer any questions people might have.

Read full topic
item.source: Robert Bohl Games: Last Chance Sale
